data.title: Chris Rock's family: ex-wife, girlfriend, children, parents, siblings
data.meta_description: Some of CHRIS ROCK'S FAMILY members have been in the limelight and others away. Here is more about his ex-wife, girlfriend, children, parents and siblings.
data.text:
Huge celebrity families have proven that the bigger the number, the merrier it becomes. From Hollywood veterans who turned their kids into stars to producers and directors who endowed their families with every conceivable talent, some of these families have improved their legacies generation after generation. Such is Chris Rock's family, whose members have done everything necessary to live up to the Rock family name.

Chris Rock is one of the few names that will come to mind when you think about established personalities in the American entertainment industry. He is a stand-up comedian who doubles up as an actor and filmmaker. He is famous for starring in Nurse Betty, I Think I Love My Wife, and Spiral.

Who is Chris Rock?

He is an American actor, comedian and filmmaker born on 7th February 1965, in Andrews, South Carolina, USA. How old is Chris Rock? The filmmaker is 57 years old as of 2022. After his birth, his parents moved from Andrews, South Carolina, to the Crown Heights neighbourhood of Brooklyn, New York.

After residing there for a couple of years, the family moved and settled in Bedford-Stuyvesant, a working-class area in the northern section of the New York City borough of Brooklyn. He is American by nationality with Cameroonian descent from the Udeme people of northern Cameroon.

He attended James Madison High School, where he faced bullying, discrimination, and beating from white students. When the bullying worsened, his parents pulled him out of school and at this point, he dropped out of school altogether.

Later, he earned a General Educational Development, an alternative to the United States high school diploma. He started off by doing odd jobs, such as operating fast-food restaurants to make ends meet. He joined the entertainment industry in 1984 and has been actively involved.

Chris Rock's family

Chris has gained global recognition for his humour and unmatched acting skills. While some of his family members are in the limelight, others have chosen to lead a quiet life away from the public's eye.

Chris Rock's parents

Who is Chris Rock’s real father? He is the son of Christopher Julius Rock II, while his mother is Rose Rock. His father was born on 6th January 1932 and passed away in November 1988 at 56. He succumbed to diabetes after undergoing ulcer surgery.

Julius worked as a truck driver before shifting to become a mail delivery man. After his death, Chris and his brother Tony Rock established a charity organization devoted to him. The two still run the organization to date.

His mother, Rose, was born on 15th February 1945 in Georgetown County. She is 77 years old as of 2022. Before retirement, she worked as a teacher and a social worker for the mentally disabled.

Currently, she is a renowned philanthropist who runs a charity organization called Rock This 619. In addition to being a celebrity mother, she is an author. Rose has published a book titled Mama Rock's Rules: Ten Lessons for Raising a Household of Successful Children. In the book, she shares her little secrets of happy motherhood.

Chris Rock's siblings

Who are Chris Rock’s siblings? The American comedian has seven siblings. He has six brothers and one sister. Here is everything you should know about them:

1. Charles Ledell Rock

Charles was Chris’ older half-brother from his father’s side. He was born on 5th October 1953. Charles Rock died on 4th February 2006 at 53 after succumbing to pneumonia. For many years, he struggled with alcoholism, leading to lung illness and death.

2. Andre Rock

Who is Chris Rock’s brother? Andre is one of Chris’ younger brothers, born in April 1967. He is 55 years old as of 2022. Unlike his elder brother, Andre has chosen a more private life. He is a Samuel J Tilden High School graduate and an alumnus of Benedict College.

Andre runs and owns a trucking business known as Julius Rock Trucking Inc. The business has been named after his late father. In addition, he is married to Sandra Wilson and is a father to three boys. One of his sons is an aspiring .

3. Tony Rock

Tony was born on 30th June 1974; therefore, he is 48 years old as of 2022. He is a widely-recognized American actor, stand-up comedian and writer from Brooklyn, New York. He is famous for starring as Uncle Ryan on Everybody Hates Chris from 2008 to 2009. Tony has taken part in several successful projects such as:

Living Biblically

Reed Between the Lines

The Celibate Ny*pho Chronicles: The Web Series

What Goes Around Comes Around

Three Can Play That Game

4. Brian Rock

Brian was born in 1976, and just like Andre Rock, he has chosen a life away from the limelight. Even though he is not active on any social media platform, he occasionally appears on different posts alongside his siblings. He is a church minister.

5. Kenny Rock

Kenny is Chis Rock's younger brother, born on 16th April 1979. He is 43 years old as of 2022. He is an actor and has appeared alongside his elder brother Tony on a few projects. He has appeared in Coincidental Killer and Vesuvius. In addition to acting, Kenny works for Scholastic Corporation.

6. Andi Rock

Andi Rock is Chris’ only sister. She was born on 18th March 1985; therefore, she is 37 years old as of 2022. She is a therapist based in Rock Hill, South Carolina, USA. She also works with autistic children by helping them find their place on earth.

7. Jordan Rock

Jordan Rock is the last-born child in a family of eight. He was born on 10th February 1991; therefore, he is 31 years old as of 2022. He has followed in his brother's footsteps and is a stand-up comedian and writer. He is in a relationship with Briana Freeman, a yoga instructor.

Jordan has appeared in:

Love

The After Party

Big Time Adolescence

Take The 10

Chris Rock's ex-wife and current girlfriend

Does Chris Rock have a family? Yes. Between 2004 and 2016, he was married to Malaak Compton. She was born on 13th June 1969 in Oakland, California, USA. She is an arts management degree holder from Howard University. Malaak is the founder and executive director of a non-profit, full-service hair salon, StyleWorks.

The salon offers free services to women leaving welfare to join the workforce. When did Chris and Malaak meet? The duo met in the 1990s when she was working as a UNICEF journalist. The duo started dating almost immediately after, and a few years later, they exchanged their wedding vows on 23rd November 1996.

The couple bore two lovely daughters and adopted a third one. However, in December 2014, after 18 years of marriage, Chris filed for a divorce from his wife. He admitted that he was unfaithful to his wife and also struggled with por*ography addiction. The duo's divorce was finalized on 22nd August 2016.

Is Chris Rock in a relationship? Yes. On 7th July 2022, it was reported that the comedian started dating Lake Siegel Bell. Chris Rock’s girlfriend is an American actress, director, and screenwriter from New York City.

This is not her first relationship, as she was married to tattoo artist Scott Campbell. Lake and Scott tied the knot on 1st June 2013 after dating for more than a year. The couple has been blessed with a daughter, Nova and a son, Osgood. Unfortunately, on 28th October 2020, Campbell filed for a divorce.

Chris and Lake have been together for a few months but have kept their relationship away from the public’s attention. As a result, nothing much is known about their relationship apart from when they started dating.

Chris Rock's children

How many children does Chris Rock have? The American television actor has three children, Lola Simone Rock, Zahra Savannah Rock, and Ntombi-Futhi Samantha. Here is everything you need to know about each one of them:

1. Lola Simone Rock

Lola Simone is Rock's firstborn from his union with Malaak Compton. She was born on 28th June 2002. So how old is Lola Simone? She is 20 years old as of 2022. She lives with her mother but often spends quality time with his father, as seen in his father's Instagram pictures.

2. Zahra Savannah Rock

Zahra Savannah is Chris and Malaak's second-born child, born on 22nd May 2004. She is 18 years old as of 2022. Like her elder sister, Zahra lives in New York City with her mother. She takes part in numerous charity events organized by her mother. In addition, she also appears from time to time at public events with her father.

3. Ntombi-Futhi Samantha

Ntombi is Chris and Malaak’s adopted daughter. She was born on 23rd February 2008 in South Africa and is 14 years old as of 2022. Who are Ntombi-Futhi Samantha's biological parents? Her biological parents are Crispen Khanyile (father) and Thusang Precious Ndebele (mother).

Her parents decided to give her away for adoption after their separation. Apart from Lola and Zahra, she has two other biological siblings. In 2014, after Chris and Malaak's separation, Malaak began the legal process of adopting Ntombi.

Frequently asked questions

Who is Chris Rock? He is an American-born muti-talented stand-up comedian, actor and filmmaker.

Who was Chris Rock’s wife? The stand-up comedian was married to Malaak Compton-Rock in 1996, but they divorced in 2016.

Who is Chris Rock dating? It is reported that the actor is in a relationship with American actress Lake Siegel.

Who are Chris Rock’s parents? His parents are Christopher Julius Rock II (father) and Rose Rock (mother). Unfortunately, his father passed away in November 1988 at 56.

Does Chris Rock have any children? He has three daughters, two biological (Lola Simone Rock and Zahra Savannah Rock) and one adopted (Ntombi-Futhi Samantha).

How many siblings does Chris Rock have? The actor has seven siblings, six brothers and one sister.

Where is Chris Rock’s family now? His family lives in different parts of the United States while he splits his time between South Carolina, Brooklyn and Alpine.
